password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters
login_intro_message: Hello, you must login first to be able to use the application and enjoy all the features in Carك
instruction_place_id: • Place your ID on a flat surface
instruction_clear_details: • Make sure all details are clearly visible
collision_damage_waiver: Collision Damage Waiver up to 800.00 EGP financial responsibility
theft_protection: Theft Protection up to 800.00 EGP financial responsibility
km_included: 450 km included, extra kilometers cost 0.32 EGP/km
flexible_booking: Flexible booking: Pay at pickup, free cancellation and rebooking anytime before pickup
agree_to_terms: I agree to the terms and conditions.
is_confirmed: has been confirmed by the owner.
no_bookings_yet: You haven't booked any cars yet. Start exploring!
no_notifications_yet: You have no new notifications right now.
plate_number_invalid: Plate number must be at least 3 characters
year_range_invalid: Please enter a valid year between 1900 and current+1
seating_capacity_range: Please enter a valid seating capacity between 1 and 50
odometer_invalid: Please enter a valid number for odometer reading
car_added_error: Failed to add car. Please try again.

instructions.id_front:
Upload your Front National ID (valid and not expired).

Front side must be shown clearly.
instructions.id_back:
Upload the back side of your National ID.

Ensure all details are visible and the document is not expired.
instructions.driver_license:
Make sure both front and back sides of your driver's license are visible.

Ensure the license is not expired and all details are readable.
instructions.drugs_test:
Upload a recent drug test result issued by an authorized center.

Make sure the result includes your full name and test date.
instructions.criminal_record:
Upload an official criminal record certificate issued by the government.

Ensure it is stamped, recent (within 3 months), and your name is clear.
instructions.driving_violations:
Provide a copy or screenshot of your driving record from official sources.

Make sure any recent violations are clearly visible.
instructions.profile_photo:
Upload a clear photo of yourself facing forward with good lighting.

Avoid sunglasses, filters, or background distractions.
instructions.car_photo:
Upload multiple photos of the car from front, side, and back.

Ensure the car is clean and license plate is visible.
instructions.car_license:
Upload the official car registration document.

Ensure the car details and expiry date are visible.
instructions.vehicle_violations:
Provide a screenshot or document showing no pending vehicle violations.

Ensure your license plate number appears in the document.
instructions.insurance:
Upload a valid car insurance document with your name and coverage dates.

Ensure the policy is active and clearly readable.
instructions.car_test:
Upload a photo or PDF of the latest car inspection report.

Make sure the report includes the inspection date and pass status.
